results.title: [Viana Stern]
results.brief_description:
A U.F.O visits the Sydney Harbour Bridge; a Japanese tourist takes photos; a person meditates; people exercise and a plane flys by.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [VFL Grand Final, 1909: South Melbourne vs Carlton]
results.creator_credit: Charles Cozens Spencer and Spencers Pictures
results.brief_description: Coverage of the 1909 Australian Rules Football Grand Final played at the MCG between Carlton and South Melbourne. South Melbourne defeated Carlton 4.14 (38) to 4.12 (36), in front of a crowd of 37,759 people to win their first ever premiership. This is the earliest known surviving footage of a Victorian Football League (VFL) match.
results.title_for_label: [VFL Grand Final, 1909: South Melbourne vs Carlton]
results.description: Coverage of the 1909 Australian Rules Football Grand Final played at the MCG between Carlton and South Melbourne. South Melbourne defeated Carlton 4.14 (38) to 4.12 (36), in front of a crowd of 37,759 people to win their first ever premiership. This is the earliest known surviving footage of a Victorian Football League (VFL) match.
description_for_label: Coverage of the 1909 Australian Rules Football Grand Final played at the MCG between Carlton and South Melbourne. South Melbourne defeated Carlton 4.14 (38) to 4.12 (36), in front of a crowd of 37,759 people to win their first ever premiership. This is the earliest known surviving footage of a Victorian Football League (VFL) match.

results.title: [Various women's athletic events from the 1976 Olympic Games]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”
Shows various women’s events from the 1976 Olympic Games. Includes jumping events - pole vaulting, high jump, long jump and throwing events - shot put, javelin. Also shown are baton relay, running hurdles, endurance events. Silent film.

results.title: [Various body movements using simple apparatus]
results.brief_description: A group of British school children demonstrate body movements using various types of apparatus, eg balance beams, hoops, boxes, mats and bars. The teacher stimulates the children by making them vary their movements and using the apparatus in many different ways - each movement flowing into the next.

results.title: [Vacuum review. No. 2]
results.brief_description: Promotional documentary from around 1939 sponsored by the Vacuum Oil Company showing how Vacuum Oil lubricants are used in machinery including agricultural machinery, machinery used in the gold mining industry, a car body building plant machinery, earth moving equipment, cars and motorcycles. Title missing and no credits available.

results.title: [Untitled]
results.creator_credit: Bo Barney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bo Barney suffered a difficult and traumatic childhood where violence was a daily event, and education almost non-existent. This story of how Bo turned his life around through determination and persistence is truly inspirational.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bo Barney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
